```
FROM mcr.microsoft.com/businesscentral/sandbox
COPY ["./dlls/*", "c:/Program Files/Microsoft Dynamics NAV/150/Service/Add-ins/"]
COPY ./override/AdditionalSetup.ps1 c:/run/
```
